variable.description: What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep while sitting quietly after a lunch without alcohol?

variable.name: InCar02
variable.description: What is chance that you would doze off or fall asleep while in a car, while stopped for a few minutes in traffic?

variable.name: AtTabl02
variable.description: What is chance that you would doze off or fall asleep while at the dinner table?

variable.name: Drive02
variable.description: What is chance that you would doze off or fall asleep while driving?

variable.name: O2THPY02
variable.description: Do you usually use oxygen therapy while you sleep?

variable.name: slp_lat
variable.description: Sleep latency in minutes
variable.comment: if sleep_latency eq 1 then do; slp_lat = slplatp /60;

variable.name: slp_rdi
variable.description: Sleep time in minutes used for calculating RDI only and Arousal Index
variable.comment: slp_rdi = slpprdp/60;

variable.name: slp_time
variable.description: Sleep time in minutes when entire sleep was captured
variable.comment: if restan1 in (.,1) then do; slp_time = slpprdp /60;

variable.name: time_bed
variable.description: Period from Lights off to lights on
variable.comment: time_bed = timebedp/60;

variable.name: slp_eff
variable.description: Sleep efficiency %
variable.comment: if sleep_latency eq 1 and restan1 in (.,1) and timebedp ne 0 then do; slp_eff = 100*(slpprdp)/timebedp;

variable.name: WASO
variable.description: Minutes wake after sleep onset

variable.name: timest1p
variable.description: Pct time stage 1
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest1p = tmstg1p;

variable.name: timest2p
variable.description: Pct time stage 2
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest2p = tmstg2p;

variable.name: times34p
variable.description: Pct time stage3/4
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; times34p = tmstg34p;

variable.name: timeremp
variable.description: Pct time rem
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timeremp = tmremp;

variable.name: timest1
variable.description: Time stage 1 minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest1 = scstg1p/60;

variable.name: timest2
variable.description: Time stage 2 minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest2 = scstg2p/60;

variable.name: timest34
variable.description: Time stage 3/4 minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timest34= scstg34p/60;

variable.name: timerem
variable.description: Time rem minutes
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) then do; timerem = scremp/60;

variable.name: rem_lat1
variable.description: Rem latency I in minutes slp onset to first rem
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and restan2 in (.,0) then do; rem_lat1 = remlaip/60;

variable.name: supinep
variable.description: Pct time supine
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; supinep = 100*(remepbp+nremepbp)/slpprdp;

variable.name: nsupinep
variable.description: Pct time non-supine
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; nsupinep =100*(remepop+nremepop)/slpprdp;

variable.name: ai_all
variable.description: Arousal index all
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; ai_all = 3600*(arrembp + arremop +arnrembp +arnremop) / slpprdp;

variable.name: ai_nrem
variable.description: Arousal index non-rem
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; ai_nrem = 3600*(arnrembp +arnremop) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: ai_rem
variable.description: Arousal index rem sleep
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and scremp gt 0 then do; ai_rem = 3600*(arrembp + arremop) / scremp;

variable.name: rdi0p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 0% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi0p = 3600*(hrembp +hrop + hnrbp + hnrop +carbp+ carop +canbp + canop +oarbp +oarop + oanbp +oanop ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi2p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 2% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi2p = 3600*(hrembp2 +hrop2 + hnrbp2 + hnrop2 +carbp2+ carop2 +canbp2 + canop2 +oarbp2 +oarop2 + oanbp2 +oanop2 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi3p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 3% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi3p = 3600*(hrembp3 +hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 +carbp3+ carop3 +canbp3 + canop3 +oarbp3 +oarop3 + oanbp3 +oanop3 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi4p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 4% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi4p = 3600*(hrembp4 +hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 +carbp4+ carop4 +canbp4 + canop4 +oarbp4 +oarop4 + oanbp4 +oanop4) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi5p
variable.description: Overall RDI at 5% desat
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdi5p = 3600*(hrembp5 +hrop5 + hnrbp5 + hnrop5 +carbp5+ carop5 +canbp5 + canop5 +oarbp5 +oarop5 + oanbp5 +oanop5 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi0pa
variable.description: Overall RDI at 0% desat or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdi0pa = 3600*(hremba +hroa + hnrba + hnroa +carba + caroa +canba + canoa +oarba +oaroa + oanba +oanoa ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi2pa
variable.description: Overall RDI at 2% desat or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdi2pa = 3600*(hremba2 +hroa2 + hnrba2 + hnroa2 +carba2+ caroa2 + canbp2 + canoa2 +oarba2 +oaroa2 + oanba2 +oanoa2 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi3pa
variable.description: Overall RDI at 3% desat or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdi3pa = 3600*(hremba3 +hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 +carba3+ caroa3 +canbp3 + canoa3 +oarba3 +oaroa3 + oanba3 +oanoa3 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi4pa
variable.description: Overall RDI at 4% desat or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdi4pa = 3600*(hremba4 +hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 +carba4+ caroa4 +canbp4 + canoa4 +oarba4 +oaroa4 + oanba4 +oanoa4) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi5pa
variable.description: Overall RDI at 5% desat or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdi5pa = 3600*(hremba5 +hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 +carba5+ caroa5 + canbp5 + canoa5 +oarba5 +oaroa5 + oanba5 +oanoa5 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdi0ps
variable.description: Overall Supine RDI at 0% desat
variable.comment: if supinep gt 0 then do; rdi0ps = 3600*(hrembp + hnrbp + carbp + canbp + oarbp + oanbp)/(remepbp+nremepbp);

variable.name: rdi2ps
variable.description: Overall Supine RDI at 2% desat
variable.comment: if supinep gt 0 then do; rdi2ps = 3600*(hrembp2 + hnrbp2 + carbp2 + canbp2 + oarbp2 + oanbp2)/(remepbp+nremepbp);

variable.name: rdi3ps
variable.description: Overall Supine RDI at 3% desat
variable.comment: if supinep gt 0 then do; rdi3ps = 3600*(hrembp3 + hnrbp3 + carbp3 + canbp3 + oarbp3 + oanbp3)/(remepbp+nremepbp);

variable.name: rdi4ps
variable.description: Overall Supine RDI at 4% desat
variable.comment: if supinep gt 0 then do; rdi4ps = 3600*(hrembp4 + hnrbp4 + carbp4 + canbp4 + oarbp4 + oanbp4)/(remepbp+nremepbp);

variable.name: rdi5ps
variable.description: Overall Supine RDI at 5% desat
variable.comment: if supinep gt 0 then do; rdi5ps = 3600*(hrembp5 + hnrbp5 + carbp5 + canbp5 + oarbp5 + oanbp5)/(remepbp+nremepbp);

variable.name: rdi0pns
variable.description: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 0% desat
variable.comment: if nsupinep gt 0 then do; rdi0pns = 3600*(hrop + hnrop + carop + canop + oarop + oanop)/(remepop+nremepop);

variable.name: rdi2pns
variable.description: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 2% desat
variable.comment: if nsupinep gt 0 then do; rdi2pns = 3600*(hrop2 + hnrop2 + carop2 + canop2 + oarop2 + oanop2)/(remepop+nremepop);

variable.name: rdi3pns
variable.description: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 3% desat
variable.comment: if nsupinep gt 0 then do; rdi3pns = 3600*(hrop3 + hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3)/(remepop+nremepop);

variable.name: rdi4pns
variable.description: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 4% desat
variable.comment: if nsupinep gt 0 then do; rdi4pns = 3600*(hrop4 + hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4)/(remepop+nremepop);

variable.name: rdi5pns
variable.description: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 5% desat
variable.comment: if nsupinep gt 0 then do; rdi5pns = 3600*(hrop5 + hnrop5 + carop5 + canop5 + oarop5 + oanop5)/(remepop+nremepop);

variable.name: oahi
variable.description: Obstructive (all desats) apnea Hypopnea (4% desat) Index)
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and airqual in (3,4) then do; oahi = 3600*(hrembp4 +hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + oarbp +oarop + oanbp +oanop ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: rdirem0p
variable.description: Overall rem RDI at 0% desat
variable.comment: if scremp ne 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdirem0p = 3600*(hrembp + hrop + carbp + carop + oarbp +oarop) / scremp;

variable.name: rdirem2p
variable.description: Overall rem RDI at 2% desat
variable.comment: if scremp ne 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdirem2p = 3600*(hrembp2 + hrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2) / scremp;

variable.name: rdirem3p
variable.description: Overall rem RDI at 3% desat
variable.comment: if scremp ne 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdirem3p = 3600*(hrembp3 + hrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + oarbp3 + oarop3) / scremp;

variable.name: rdirem4p
variable.description: Overall Rem RDI at 4% desat
variable.comment: if scremp ne 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdirem4p = 3600*(hrembp4 + hrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4) / scremp;

variable.name: rdirem5p
variable.description: Overall rem RDI at 5% desat
variable.comment: if scremp ne 0 and staging5 in (.,0) then do; rdirem5p = 3600*(hrembp5 + hrop5 + carbp5 + carop5 + oarbp5 + oarop5) / scremp;

variable.name: rdinr0p
variable.description: Overall Non-rem RDI at 0% desat
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdinr0p = 3600*(hnrbp + hnrop + canbp + canop + oanbp +oanop ) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: rdinr2p
variable.description: Overall Non-rem RDI at 2% desat
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdinr2p = 3600*(hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: rdinr3p
variable.description: Overall Non-rem RDI at 3% desat
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdinr3p = 3600*(hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: rdinr4p
variable.description: Overall Non-rem RDI at 4% desat
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdinr4p = 3600*(hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: rdinr5p
variable.description: Overall Non-rem RDI at 5% desat
variable.comment: if staging5 in (.,0) and slpprdp gt 0 then do; rdinr5p = 3600*(hnrbp5 + hnrop5 + canbp5 + canop5 + oanbp5 + oanop5) / (slpprdp - scremp);

variable.name: oai0p
variable.description: Obstructive Apnea Index all desats
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and airqual in (3,4) then do; oai0p = 3600*(oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: oai4p
variable.description: Obstructive Apnea Index 4% desats
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and airqual in (3,4) then do; oai4p = 3600*(oarbp4 + oarop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: oai4pa
variable.description: Obstructive Apnea Index 4% or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and airqual in (3,4) and staging5 in (.,0) then do; oai4pa = 3600*(oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: cai0p
variable.description: Central Apnea Index all desats
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and abdoqual in (3,4) and chstqual in (3,4) then do; cai0p = 3600*(carbp + carop + canbp + canop ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: cai4p
variable.description: Central Apnea Index 4% desats
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and abdoqual in (3,4) and chstqual in (3,4) then do; cai4p = 3600*(carbp4 + carop4 + canbp4 + canop4 ) / slpprdp;

variable.name: cai4pa
variable.description: Central Apnea Index 4% or arousal
variable.comment: if slpprdp gt 0 and abdoqual in (3,4) and chstqual in (3,4) and staging5 in (.,0) then do; cai4pa = 3600*(carba4 + caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 ) / slpprdp;

variable.description: Pct time lt 90% desat
variable.comment: if oximqual in (3,4) then do; pctlt90 = pctsa90h;

variable.name: sao2rem
variable.description: Avg sao2 rem
variable.comment: if oximqual in (3,4) and staging5 in (.,0) then do; sao2rem = avsao2rh; end; if avsao2rh < 10 then sao2rem = .;

variable.name: sao2nrem
variable.description: Avg sao2 nrem
variable.comment: if oximqual in (3,4) and staging5 in (.,0) then do; sao2nrem = avsao2nh; end; if avsao2nh < 10 then sao2nrem = .;

variable.name: losao2r
variable.description: Min sao2 rem
variable.comment: if oximqual in (3,4) and staging5 in (.,0) then do; losao2r = mnsao2rh; end; if mnsao2rh < 10 then losao2r = .;

variable.name: losao2nr
variable.description: Min sao2 nrem
variable.comment: if oximqual in (3,4) and staging5 in (.,0) then do; losao2nr = mnsao2nh; end; if mnsao2nh < 10 then losao2nr =.;
